page.title: 03CHANGING TIMES
page.content: The church does not have a minister since the death of the last incumbent.Services are only held on alternate Sundays. Housing has changed considerably with 15 new houses being built in the last decade. The school bell used to be rung to call in the children for school, this is no longer done. In farming many hedges have been destroyed to make modern methods easier. Two agricultural barns have been constructed recently. Farmers used to deliver milk on carts, now they use tractors. Many trees have had preservation orders put on them so that farmers cannot fell them without permission.
